citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 7/20/16 at 1:30 PM to do a facility inspection.
* A family member stated that the licensee had a prior engagement and would not be available to do a facility
inspection. They also stated that they had no idea when the licensee would be home.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Greenough Faron, Compliance Specialist
